headline: Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) Expands Share Buyback Plan By US$6 Billion
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) recently increased its equity buyback plan by $6 billion, raising the total authorization to $14 billion. This decision comes alongside the company's Q1 earnings report, which showed significant growth in both sales and net income, reinforcing AMD's financial robustness. In the context of a broader market uptrend of 5.1% over the past week and an 11% increase over the past year, AMD's stock price movement of approximately 25% upward in the last month was...

headline: 3 Stocks That May Be Trading At Discounts Of Up To 48.1%

headline: Is AMD Stock Due for a Big Rally After Its Earnings Beat?
